title: Medianeira, Rio Grande do Sul
text:
Medianeira is a <a href="neighbourhood">neighbourhood</a> ("bairro") in the city of <a href="Porto%20Alegre">Porto Alegre</a>, the state capital of <a href="Rio%20Grande%20do%20Sul">Rio Grande do Sul</a>, in <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>. It was created by Law 1762 from July 23, 1957, but had its limits modified by Law 4626 from December 21, 1979.
Medianeira was the first neighbourhood officially recognized by Porto Alegre <a href="City%20Hall">City Hall</a>, and it was named after its local <a href="parish">parish</a>, called "Nossa Senhora Medianeira". There is located a highly regarded <a href="private%20school">private school</a> of the city, the <a href="Col%C3%A9gio%20Jo%C3%A3o%20XXIII%2C%20Porto%20Alegre">João XXIII</a> school.
Medianeira is home to the "<a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Ol%C3%ADmpico%20Monumental">Estádio Olímpico Monumental</a>", built in 1954.
